data.title: Picnic
data.meta_description: Whitehall, Henry Flagler's Gilded Age estate in Palm Beach, was called "more wonderful than any palace in Europe, grander and more magnificent than any ...
data.text:
Picnic in the Cocoanut Grove

Available Tuesday through Sunday

Grab-and-go fare

Seating is available outside in the Cocoanut Grove

Picnics may be purchased in the H. M. Flagler and Co.® Museum Store

Advance purchase is not required but availability is limited

On-line purchases can only be guaranteed if purchased at least 48 hours in advance.

Purchase Picnics

Picnic's menu of sandwiches are all served on a brioche bun with a small fruit cup and chocolate chip cookie, and are available for purchase in the H. M. Flagler & Co.® Museum Store. Beverages available include Harney & Sons Organic Iced Tea, Harney & Sons Organic Lemonade, and water. Hungry visitors may choose from Chicken Waldorf Salad, Turkey and Brie, Ham and Swiss, Tomato and Mozzarella with Balsamic Vinegar.

Enjoy Picnic's provisions outside in the Cocoanut Grove, where tables and chairs offer respite in the shade of palm trees. Seating is available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Each sandwich is $17 plus tax (total $18.19). Availability is limited. Menu is subject to change.
